article.Heading: Budget 2017: Abolishing of FIPB is a logical decision says Commerce Minister
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Rituparna Bhuyan, Nirmala Sitharaman, Commerce Minister gave her take on Arun Jaitely’s Union Budget and outlook on the road ahead.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Rituparna Bhuyan, Nirmala Sitharaman, Commerce Minister gave her take on Arun Jaitely’s Union Budget and outlook on the road ahead.

Watch accompanying videos for more details.
